question: Which Union Territory of India recently hosted the first ever Food Processing Summit?
explanation:
The Union Territory of Ladakh recently hosted the first ever Food Processing Summit to guide the entrepreneurs and attract investments. The UT administration of Ladakh hosts the summit in association with the Union Ministry of Commerce and Industry and the Union Ministry of Food Processing Industries.
Several entrepreneurs from Leh and Kargil regions are participating in the Summit. As Ladakh is capable of exporting processed foods made from unique horticultural products, the entrepreneurs were encouraged to begin their own start-up companies in the food processing sector.
